ygData.subject: Re: fun with charm
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Man, thats a great idea.  I bet it would make for a GREAT screen shot if you had that wisp attack a kerran spider on wisp isle.  If you do it right, loads
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Brewhaus <brewhaus@...>
>How about this. If you charm a magical being, like a wisp, than have it
>attack, would the thing it is fighting be able to hit it? This could be
>used to take on much higher level creatures that couldn't hit magical.
>Might be a sort of cheat. I don't know.

Man, thats a great idea. I bet it would make for a GREAT screen shot if
you had that
wisp attack a kerran spider on wisp isle. If you do it right, loads of
spiders would train.

Hmm, I wonder if a wisp could kill one of those kerran natives.

Question about when charmed pets kill something. Do you get a faction hit?

Azboklin the enchanter
